Jailbreak_AD_SpottedMissingPrisoners.synopsis: This fires when a guard notices that the prisoners in Moonrise Towers are missing from their cells.
Jailbreak_AD_SpottedMissingPrisoners.how_to_trigger: Load scl - speak to wulbren, convince him that you're here to help - throw a hammer to him through the bars - tell him to escape. Wait outside the cells for a passing guard to notice.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Upon reviewing the provided session data, 'Jailbreak_AD_SpottedMissingPrisoners' includes specific trigger instructions detailing an event (guards noticing missing prisoners following a jailbreak attempt) while 'General_SpottedUnwelcomeVisitors' contains no additional details, synopsis, or trigger instructions. There is no explicit indication that one of these sessions must precede the other, nor is there information suggesting that triggering one would prevent or force triggering the other. Without additional context linking the two (such as one being a consequence of the other or them representing alternative narrative paths), no ordering or mutual exclusivity constraints can be definitively established.

Jailbreak_AD_SpottedMissingPrisoners_0.text: Get the Warden - the prisoners have escaped!

General_SpottedUnwelcomeVisitors_0.speaker: Narrator
General_SpottedUnwelcomeVisitors_0.text: *You're not welcome in Moonrise, and your presence hasn't gone unnoticed. Time to fight... or flee.*

General_SpottedUnwelcomeVisitors_1.speaker: Narrator
General_SpottedUnwelcomeVisitors_1.text: *You'll need to avoid attention while exploring Moonrise - one among you isn't permitted to be here.*
